metadata.description: Skills for healthcare workflows including clinical trials, prior authorization, and FHIR API development

plugins.name: clinical-trial-protocol
plugins.description: Generate FDA/NIH-compliant clinical trial protocols for medical devices or drugs

plugins.name: prior-auth-review
plugins.description: Automate payer review of prior authorization requests with clinical documentation synthesis

plugins.name: fhir-developer
plugins.description: FHIR API development guide for building healthcare endpoints with R4 resources and SMART authorization

plugins.name: edi-claims-enrollment
plugins.description: Review, validate, and pre-process EDI X12 837/834/270/271/276/277 transactions with intelligent error messages and human-review-ready summaries

plugins.name: npi-registry
plugins.description: Access US National Provider Identifier (NPI) Registry

plugins.name: icd10-codes
plugins.description: Access ICD-10-CM and ICD-10-PCS code sets
